item.title: Trump says he'll host a UFC fight on White House grounds next year
item.description: President Trump plugged a "championship" UFC fight on the White House grounds next year.

item.title: Ex-NBA player Ben McLemore found guilty of rape by Oregon jury
item.description: Ben McLemore was found guilty by a Portland-area jury of raping a woman at a party attended by many of his then-Portland Trail Blazer teammates.

item.title: Texas family's dream vacation turns into nightmare after man nearly cut in half by boat propeller
item.description: Whitney Slough said her husband and their two daughters were snorkeling about 20 feet from the beach when a small boat appeared along the shoreline.

item.title: 4 killed, 14 wounded in River North mass shooting
item.description: The drive-by shooting apparently happened as people left Artis Lounge nightclub following an album release party for rapper Mello Buckzz.

item.title: 3/3/2024: Operation Lone Star; 97 Books; Artemis
item.description: First, a report on barricades and battles on the Texas border. Then, a look at why Beaufort banned five books from school libraries. And, a report on ...
